coreAttributes.authorTag: 'Woven by the DSG Textile Guild' is printed on one end of the board.
coreAttributes.name: bolt of green cloth
coreAttributes.description: A cut of dark green fabric wrapped around cardboard for easy transport. You selected the colour based on Eisek's stated preferences.

effectTooltipLines.line: One of [style.colourGood(three)] items that you need to fix up Eisek's stall.

coreAttributes.applyEffects: The cotton fabric is as simple as can be, dyed green and somewhat coarse but seems luxurious compared to the burlap that currently adorns Eisek's stall.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unroll)] the bolt to get a closer look at the fabric...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unroll)] the bolt to show it off to [npc2.name], who [npc.verb(lean)] in to get a closer look at the fabric...
